name: SquaRED - Number Sliding
description:
SquaRED puts a spin on the classic number pairing game. Whether you’re a beginner (yes, I’m talking about you) or a pro (hmm, debatable), the variety of game modes will challenge you. Play with varying grid sizes, and with a timer if you want to challenge yourself further too. You won’t win.

It is as beautiful as it is witty, and minimalistic as it is fun. The animations and ticking timer keep you on edge, and the wonderful haptics keep you engaged.

This is a classic like you’ve always known it, but better, way better. I hope you enjoy SquaRED as much as I enjoyed making it!
